string.name: suggestions_cc_autofill_paid_plans_title
string.comment: This string is shown in the autofill suggestions when the user is not on a paid plan but has credit cards that can be autofilled

resources.string: Use login details from \"%s\" on this app or website.
TOTP has been copied to clipboard
You have been logged out. Please log in again by opening the app.

string.name: autofill_cc_upgrade_dialog_title
string.comment: Title of the dialog that will appear when the user clicks on Autofill credit card but is on Free plan

string.name: autofill_cc_upgrade_dialog_message
string.comment: Message of the dialog that will appear when the user clicks on Autofill credit card but is on Free plan

resources.string: Autofilling credit card details is a paid feature. If you want Proton Pass to automatically enter your card details for you in apps and websites, please upgrade to a paid plan.

string.name: autofill_confirm_dangerous_title
string.comment: Title for the dialog that will appear when the user clicks on Autofill but we think it may be a dangerous action

string.name: autofill_confirm_dangerous_body
string.comment: Body for the dialog that will appear when the user clicks on Autofill but we think it may be a dangerous action

resources.string: You are about to autofill your credentials into a website that\'s opened by your current app. The app can have access to the credential after autofill - only do it if you trust the app.

string.name: autofill_confirm_button
string.comment: Confirmation button for actually performing the autofill action
